title: Enchanting Ruby & Diamond Pendant Necklace
features: Geometric design pendant featuring a central square-cut ruby. Encrusted with brilliant cut diamonds around the ruby and along the pendant's structural framework. Features five delicate ruby droplet accents below. Chain is designed with diamond-studded geometric motifs set in gold.
occasions: or to add a touch of regal elegance to any evening attire. Also suitable for special occasions.
description: A unique blend of contemporary design and gemstone elegance. The striking ruby and diamond combination makes this pendant a statement piece. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting luster and finish. This necklace seamlessly merges traditional gemstone brilliance with a modern aesthetic.
